news.title: Cuttack administration imposes ₹12 crore penalty for illegal sand mining after drone survey
news.para: Cuttack administration has levied Rs 12 crore in penalties on sand extraction operators following a drone survey. The advanced survey revealed large-scale illegal mining across 15 major quarries, exceeding lease boundaries. Strict enforcement and routine surveillance will continue to combat illicit sand lifting.

news.title: Ludhiana civic body sets weekly targets to boost property tax recovery
news.para: Ludhiana Municipal Corporation Commissioner Aaditya Dachalwal reviewed the property tax and building branches to boost pending dues recovery and curb illegal constructions. Weekly targets have been set for officials, with strict action threatened for non-compliance. The corporation aims to meet its Rs 180 crore property tax target for 2025-26.

news.title: Odisha government collects ₹27.4 crore as penalty for illegal sand mining
news.para: Odisha has collected over Rs 27 crore in penalties this financial year for illegal minor mineral extraction, with Rs 48.4 crore amassed in the previous year. Authorities conducted thousands of raids, seizing numerous vehicles to curb illicit sand mining. The state employs GPS demarcation, CCTV, and drone surveillance to monitor operations and prevent revenue loss.

news.title: Buy booklet for Devpur Para scheme by November 30: Lucknow development body
news.para: The registration booklet for the LDA's Atal Nagar Housing Scheme in Devpur Para is available until November 30. Only those who purchase the booklet can complete their registration on the LDA website by December 2. The scheme offers 2,496 flats, including 1 BHK and 2 BHK units. Prices start from Rs 9.82 lakh.

news.title: BHIVE leases 15,000 sq ft workspace in Jayanagar, Bengaluru
news.para: BHIVE Workspace has secured a new 15,000 sq ft office space in Bengaluru's Jayanagar 4th Block. This marks a second collaboration with Garuda Group. The new center has a capacity for over 650 seats.

news.title: Madras HC issues notice to government on DPR for Madurai metro rail project
news.para: The Madras High Court has ordered notices to the Centre, state, and CMRL regarding a plea to revise and resubmit the Madurai Metro rail project's Detailed Project Report.

news.title: Pucca house approval letters worth ₹2.5 crore distributed to beneficiaries in Khanauri
news.para: Cabinet minister Barinder Kumar Goyal distributed approval letters worth Rs 2.55 crore to 102 beneficiaries under Pradhan Mantri Awas Yojana in Khanauri. He also announced upcoming development works totaling Rs 5 crore, including a sports stadium and a water treatment plant, aiming to ensure housing and development reach all sections of society.

news.title: Ikea plans to add 4-5 stores every year
news.para: Ikea is accelerating its expansion in India, aiming to open four to five stores each year. This move follows a successful strategy of localizing products and strengthening logistics in major cities. The company is focusing on a mix of leased and owned properties for faster growth.

news.title: Development permission given for 17 tall buildings in Ahmedabad in past two years
news.para: Ahmedabad Municipal Corporation approved construction plans for 17 tall buildings over 70 meters, generating Rs 250 crore. Developers are focusing on western areas, with Bodakdev leading in skyscraper approvals. The city is set to see its first residential building exceeding 100 meters soon.

news.title: Nagpur civic body to auction 113 properties worth ₹141 crore to recover ₹1.9 crore tax
news.para: The Nagpur Municipal Corporation (NMC) is set to auction 113 properties valued at Rs141 crore to recover Rs1.9 crore in outstanding property tax dues.  Despite prior notices, defaulters have failed to clear their arrears. The zone-wise auctions will take place between December 12 and January 16 to enforce compliance and boost civic revenue.

news.title: Can Fin's growth story finds new homes in the North
news.para: The surge in Can Fin Homes' stock prices reflects its successful strategy to extend operations outside southern India. As the company spreads its wings, it expects a substantial increase in its asset management growth. Recent reports indicate a sharp rise in loan disbursements, backed by strong asset quality and controlled NPAs.

news.title: Square Yards secures $35 million funding, eyes unicorn status ahead of 2026 IPO
news.para: Integrated real estate and mortgage platform SquareYards has secured $35 million in funding, valuing the company at $900 million. With strong revenue growth and a significant contribution from its fintech segment, SquareYards is preparing for a potential $100 million funding round and an IPO in 2026, aiming to achieve unicorn status.

news.title: Mumbai: Builder razes society with illegal explosives
news.para: Panic erupted in Andheri West as a housing society was demolished using alleged explosives, causing a blast-like noise and a massive dust cloud. Residents reported breathing difficulties and low visibility, with concerns raised about the use of banned materials and flouting of BMC guidelines. Authorities have issued a stop-work notice and are investigating the unauthorized demolition.

news.title: Haryana RERA sets aside cancellation of flat, orders MRG Infrabuild to pay 10.9% interest for delay
news.para: Haryana RERA has overturned a flat cancellation in an affordable housing project, ordering developer MRG Infrabuild to reinstate the unit. The builder wrongly cancelled the allotment despite the buyer overpaying and failed to meet project timelines. The buyer will receive delay compensation at 10.9% annually, with the developer facing penalties for the improper cancellation and delayed possession.

news.title: JPMorgan to build multi-billion pound tower in London's Canary Wharf
news.para: JPMorgan Chase & Co is gearing up to reshape the landscape of Canary Wharf with an impressive new skyscraper. This multi-billion investment is not only a testament to the company's faith in the UK's economic potential but also a catalyst for job creation, bringing thousands of positions to the local area.

news.title: Punjab CM launches 'easy registry' initiative to facilitate people
news.para: Punjab Chief Minister Bhagwant Mann has launched an 'easy registry' initiative. Citizens can now register properties at any Sub-Registrar office within their district. Online submission of documents is possible within 48 hours.

news.title: JK Cement's subsidiary invests AED 6 million to set up manufacturing facility in Ras Al Khaimah
news.para: JK DryChem Industries LLC, part of JK Cement, is channeling AED 6 million into a state-of-the-art manufacturing facility within Ras Al Khaimah Economic Zone. This plant will focus on producing premium construction chemicals and additives, with operations kicking off in January 2026.

news.title: Umiya Buildcon acquires 20,000 sq ft plot in Bengaluru’s CBD
news.para: Umiya Buildcon has secured a prime plot in Bengaluru's central business district for a new residential development.  Bengaluru's housing market is poised for continued growth, with strong demand in mid-income and luxury segments.
